title: Machinarium v2.0.39 -XpoZ
description:
Machinarium is the award-winning independent adventure game!

4.6-Google Play
10/10-Steam
4.5/5-iTunes - Apple

Machinarium is a puzzle point-and-click adventure game developed by Amanita Design

WHAT IS NEW IN THIS VERSION:

* Pinch-to-zoom (small screen friendly)
* Supports both Phones and Tablets
* Better Graphics
* Achievements
* Cloud Save
* Support for Android TV and NVIDIA Shield devices
* Support for gamepads (Android 5 or newer)
* Localization to 14 languages

Instructions

3.Launch the Game
4.Enjoy.
